title: For sale Bobby Mathews cabinet.  Next HoFer?? SOLD

posts.post_title: For sale Bobby Mathews cabinet.  Next HoFer?? SOLD
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jim Manos
Photographer is Lang Boston. He is in Uniform with sweater. He played for Boston 1881 and 1882. Cabinet was purchased originally from 19th Century Only about 5 yrs ago.

posts.post_title: For sale Bobby Mathews cabinet.  Next HoFer?? SOLD
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jim Manos
It was brought to my attention that this is from an original negative produced in the early teens. The gentleman I got it from gave me some more items in our trade so I will keep it and sell as is nice image of a potential future hofer. Please ask for a scan, it is a neat piece as he is in a baseball uniform/sweater. Thank you Leon for the info and Javan for your honesty. $250  

Furthermore, I am told this piece was sold at 19th Century Auction house for $350 before the hammer 5 yrs ago.
